Name: A Plot Story
About the game: Girl Lily gets assignment from a strange man Peter. She needs to break into the Duchessâ€™s mansion and to steal her papers. Entering the mansion, Lily finds out that the duchess is engaged in black magic and is plotting against the King. Now Lily will have to disrupt the Duchess's cunning plans and save the kingdom from chaos. An exciting story in hidden object genre, puzzle, occurring in a magic world. 91 game level. 12 hours of fascinating gameplay. More than 10 different game mechanics. 500 unique game tools.
